Detailed Description

EMAC Statistics The statistics structure is used to retrieve the current count of various packet events in the system. These values represent the delta values from the last time the statistics were read.

Field Documentation

uint32_t EMAC_STATISTICS_tag::Frame1024tUp

Total Tx&Rx with Octet Size of >=1024

uint32_t EMAC_STATISTICS_tag::Frame128t255

Total Tx&Rx with Octet Size of 128 to 255

Total Tx&Rx with Octet Size of 512 to 1023

Total Tx&Rx with Octet Size of 64

uint32_t EMAC_STATISTICS_tag::Frame65t127

Total Tx&Rx with Octet Size of 65 to 127

uint32_t EMAC_STATISTICS_tag::NetOctets

Sum of all Octets Tx or Rx on the Network
